query.statement:
SELECT (SELECT V2.ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS V2 WHERE V2.MANDT = B.MANDT AND V2.POSID = B.POSID) AS POST1, A.DSKURZTEXT, A.PAPRDT, A.PAPRIDTX, (SELECT V.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 AS V WHERE V.MANDT = B.MANDT AND V.LIFNR = B.LIFNR) AS LIFNR, B.NAMET, B.NAMET2 ,(SELECT Z.DIPBXNUMB FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1401 AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = A.MANDT AND Z.PSPID = A.PSPID AND Z.POSID = A.HOGI AND Z.GBN = 'C') AS DIPBXNUMB -- 비상통화장치 추가
FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT019 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.POSID = A.PSPID AND B.POSID_1 = A.HOGI
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.WERKS = '1000' AND A.PSPID = #PJT# AND A.ART IN ('8960', '8950') -- 중간검사 추가 AND A.HOGI = #HNO#
ORDER BY A.ART DESC, A.SEQ DESC fetch first 1 rows only --FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
